mapper.insert:
insert into admin_guide_price (food_id, price_date, max_price, max_price_trend, average_price, low_price, low_price_trend) VALUES
(#{item.foodId}, #{item.priceDate}, #{item.maxPrice}, #{item.maxPriceTrend}, #{item.averagePrice}, #{item.lowPrice}, #{item.lowPriceTrend}) ;
mapper.select: select price_date from admin_guide_price order by price_date desc limit 1;

SELECT a.`average_price`, a.`low_price`, a.`max_price`, a.`low_price_trend`, a.`max_price_trend`, b.`name` FROM `admin_guide_price` a LEFT JOIN `admin_food` b ON b.id = a.`food_id` WHERE b.`category_id` =#{categoryId}

SELECT a.id, a.`average_price`, a.`low_price`, a.`max_price`, a.`low_price_trend`, a.`max_price_trend`, b.`name`, b.category_id FROM `admin_guide_price` a LEFT JOIN `admin_food` b ON b.id = a.`food_id`;
